title: "Onit acquires legal startup McCarthyFinch to inject AI into legal workflows"
excerpt: "Onit, a workflow software company based in Houston with a legal component, announced this week that it has acquired 2018 TechCrunch Disrupt Battlefield alum McCarthyFinch.  Onit intends to use the startup’s AI skills to beef up its legal workflow software offerings."
